q: decision on whom to support in the next presidential election. "I'm not committed to Barack Obama . I'm not committed to a Republican candidate," Colin Powell told CNN Chief Political Correspondent Candy Crowley . I am not committed to any candidate until I see all the candidates and finally see who the two candidates are who are going for this position. "Right now I do not see on the Republican side any one individual who I think is going to emerge at the top of the pile," Colin Powell added. CNN welcomes a lively and courteous

, who plays scathing cheerleading coach Sue Sylvester on the TV show, believes there are many similarities between the teacher and the straight-talking talent show judge. Jane Lynch Inspired By Simon Cowell For Glee Character. She said: If ever there was a guy who tells it like it is, then it's Simon Cowell . You could definitely look at Sue and say there's a lot of Simon Cowell in her. He's a great inspiration for the character of Sue- there is a lot that I can take from him and put into her. Jane Lynch also admitted she is "amazed" by the public's reaction to Sue and believes people admire her in the same way they respect music mogul Simon Cowell . Mr David Cameron told the BBC that he believed Mr Andy Coulson had already made amends for "bad things" that happened during his editorship, and insisted that the communications chief deserved a second chance. I always think that the danger at the moment is that he is effectively being punished twice for the same offence, he said. "I gave him a second chance. It has yet to report a profit since emerging from bankruptcy in June 2009. But it said it made an operating profit, excluding restructuring costs, which was greater than the company's internal targets.
